BotDefinition.name: BotDefinition
BotDefinition.description: Represents a top level object for Einstein Bots or Agentforce Agents.

AgentTemplate.description: If this BotDefinition represents an agent, this field represents the name of the agent template used to create it.

AgentType.description: The agent type. For example, Agentforce Service Agent (ASA) or Agentforce Employee Agent (AEA).

BotUserId.description: The user ID associated with the bot definition.

Description.description: A description for the bot or agent.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name for this object.

MasterLabel.description: The master label of the bot.

Type.description: This field represents the configuration type of the bot. The default value is Bot.
